title: Ingest and QC a New TV Series Episode
description: A new episode of a flagship TV series has been delivered by the production house and must be ingested and quality checked before its premiere.

tasks.description: Receive the new episode file and log it in the media asset management system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully ingests the file and creates a new asset record.

tasks.description: Run an automated QC check on the file for technical issues like video artifacts or audio sync problems.
tasks.expected_outcome: The QC scan reports a minor audio sync issue in the last 5 minutes of the episode.

tasks.description: Flag the episode for manual review by a QC operator and notify the production house of the issue.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a review task and sends an automated notification.
